name: opsx-archive
prompt:
Archive a completed OpenSpec change. This will:
1. Move the change from openspec/changes/ to openspec/specs/<category>/history/
2. Update spec.md to reflect final state
3. Mark the change as completed

Change to archive: {{name}}

Only archive changes that have been fully implemented and verified.

arguments.name: name
arguments.description: Name of the change to archive
